duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with customers and provide exceptional customer service on the sales floor.
Maintain a neat and tidy sales floor by organizing and displaying garments according to company guidelines.
Process, stock, and replenish garments on the sales floor and stock room.
Perform transactions on the register and promote the H&M Loyalty program to customers.
Collaborate with colleagues and contribute to a positive working environment.
Adhere to health and safety regulations and store procedures.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
